levels.description: etcd: Shared configuration has been learned by the local node.
levels.details: All shared configuration has been synchronised to the local node. Once the local node has joined any backend clusters, it may be safely added to DNS to allow it to start providing service.

levels.description: etcd: Shared configuration has not been learned on the local node
levels.details: Some shared configuration has not been received at the local node yet.  If you have not uploaded all the shared config yet, this alarm will clear once that is done.  You should not add the local node to DNS until this alarm clears.
